name: Nicer Pinboard
description: This is an alternative stylesheet for Pinboard, which gives it a slightly more modern and usable look, while retaining the original simplicity that we all love. It's got new spacing, a new font, better tags and some other enhancements.
additional_info:
v1.1. YOU NEED TO ADD THIS LINE at the beginning of the CSS to get the better font (it won't save here): 
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro:400,400italic,600");
There is a thing to auto-add language flag emojis to tags like “lang:de”, “lang:fr” which I find useful but that you may not like, or that may break your experience because your browser doesn't support emojis. You will just need to comment out the last part of the CSS, where it says “flag emojis”.
